name: dbots
description: Discord bot list poster and stats retriever

scripts.docs: node scripts/docs.js && docgen --source src --custom docs/index.yml --output docs/docs.json --jsdoc docs/docgen.json && node scripts/post-docgen.js
scripts.gpr-publish: npm run gpr-setup && npm login --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com --scope=@dbots-pkg && npm publish
scripts.types: npm run tsd-jsdoc && mv out/types.d.ts typings/index.d.ts && rm out --dir && node scripts/post-types.js && npm run tslint:fix
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run eslint:fix && npm run tslint:fix && NODE_ENV=production npm run webpack

author: Snazzah
